content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(12.5, 13.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric pole (position 12.5, 13.5)
- Electric pole (position 15.5, 15.5)
- Electric pole (position 11.5, 13.5)
- Electric pole (position 20.5, 10.5)
- Electric pole (position 9.5, 13.5)
- Electric pole (position 10.5, 13.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(-28.5, -61.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper cable factory at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1) and inserter (position a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### Furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
Status: EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS, Fuel: 13

### Furnace at position(2.0, 0.0)
Status: EntityStatus.FULL_OUTPUT, Fuel: 6

### Furnace at position(2.0, 2.0)
Status: EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS, Fuel: 20

### Chest at position(5.5, 0.5)
Status: EntityStatus.NORMAL, Inventory: {'iron-plate': 160}

### Lab at position(x)
Status: EntityStatus.NO_POWER, Research: automation

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure that all required ingredients are available before attempting to use furnaces or assembling machines. Check inventory and resource availability.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to power supply
- Ensure that all structures requiring power are connected to a power source. Check the status of electric poles and lab power connections.
